tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_locations; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_locations AS SELECT acvl.id, acvl.parent_location, acvl.location_name, COALESCE(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Country'), 999999999) AS country_id, COALESCE(getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Country')), 'Undefined') AS country_name, COALESCE(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Region'), 999999999) AS region_id, COALESCE(getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Region')), 'Undefined') AS region_name, COALESCE(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Zone'), 999999999) AS zone_id, COALESCE(getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Zone')), 'Undefined') AS zone_name, COALESCE(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'District'), 999999999) AS district_id, COALESCE(getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'District')), 'Undefined') AS district_name
FROM amp_category_value_location acvl
UNION ALL
SELECT 999999999, null, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined';
